title: Crime Alert 11.15.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 11.15.19
description:
39- year- old son kicks mom's dog, killing it after she says he can't bring someone back to her home for sex.   Mom/daughter smugglers off to jail for 62 pounds of pot.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
